name: Open Door Mission
short_desc: Hot breakfast served Sunday-Friday, 7am. Hot dinner served Monday-Friday, 6:25pm and Sunday, 3pm
description: Provides hot breakfast and dinner to men, women and children. Provides breakfast at 7am Sunday-Friday.  Also serves hot dinner Monday -Friday starting at 6:25pm and on Sunday at 3pm. Thanksgiving Dinner on November 22nd 2012 starting at 6:45pm.
